I think this top was really cute, but it did not fit me properly and it wasn’t made properly either. I’m pretty used clothes being too large on me, so when this top didn't fit quite the way I wanted it to, I didn’t question it, I was still going to wear it. When I did go to tie it back to make it wearable, I realized that one of the straps was longer than the other. Besides that, when the top fit right, it was moderately comfortable. The fabric is soft and durable, and the lace details are also soft but with a bit more stretch making it pretty comfortable. I think if this product was made to fit its sizing better, I would’ve like this product a whole lot more than I did.
